title: A Christmas Wish (1950) Romantic Comedy | with Jimmy Durante | Directed by Irving Pichel

sources.title: A Christmas Wish (1950) Romantic Comedy | with Jimmy Durante | Directed by Irving Pichel
sources.description:
A family moves into an apartment where Rupert the squirrel lives in the attic rafters. Just as it seems that the Christmas holiday will come and go without so much as a Christmas tree, Rupert acts as the family’s guardian angel - not only saving Christmas, but changing their lives forever.


Colorized version: https://youtu.be/KrfW-JoY-Iw


Original title: The Great Rupert (1950)
Director: Irving Pichel
Writers: László Vadnay, James O'Hanlon 
Genres: Classics, Christmas, Comedy, Family

Main Actors:
Jimmy Durante - Mr. Louie Amendola
Terry Moore - Rosalinda Amendola
Tom Drake - Peter 'Pete' Dingle
Frank Orth - Mr. Frank Dingle
Sara Haden - Mrs. Katie Dingle
Queenie Smith - Mrs. Amendola
Chick Chandler - Phil Davis
Jimmy Conlin - Joe Mahoney
Rupert, an animated squirrel


@CultCinemaClassics
